title: 从DAO地址提取COFI，补偿V1版本中的部分做市商
body:
在V1版本中，有两个做市商矿池，分别是ETH/USDT与ETH/HBTC，这两个矿池的COFI，根据区块间隔数量，由0x00000000000000地址生成并转入。
但是，在ETH链上，不可能每经过一个区块，就产生一笔0x000000000000地址的交易，这样会浪费很多gas费。当有用户取回做市商矿池的COFI时，这时候系统会计算上次转入区块高度与本次区块高度的区块数量，并产生相应的COFI，转入做市商矿池。
这样，就会造成，做市商矿池的COFI余额，与实际应该发放给用户的COFI不一致，因为有一部分COFI，随着区块高度的流逝，其实已经产生了，但是由于没有用户做取回的操作，所以并未由0x00000000地址生成和转入。
所以，当V1版本关闭后，有部分做市商，特别是ETH/HBTC的做市商，出现应取回的COFI消失的情况，经过查询链上数据，用户损失情况如下：
USDT/ETH，最后出矿区块：12450774
HBTC/ETH，最后出矿区块：12380120
间隔区块：70654。每区块出矿0.297，未发放的数量：20984.238 cofi

即有20984个COFI，其实已经产生，由于合约的设计，这20984枚COFI并未生成及转入矿池。

telegram 已经有用户反馈这个情况，经过社区讨论，我们决定对损失的用户进行补偿：
0x8bc0fc5b31fa30266a3dd81753be66ee4b62a7f9---2802.83cofi
0x5fa1dd7f6dce7066d8be8b8787575d66a20dc44c---17277.79cofi
其他---903.609594369906378cofi

补偿的COFI，来源于DAO资金。

现在就是否同意从DAO账户转出20984枚COFI对以上用户进行补偿，进行投票。

Extracting COFI from DAO addresses to compensate for some of the market makers in v1

In v1, there are two market maker mining pools, ETH/USDT and ETH/HBTC, which have COFIs that are generated and transferred in from 0x00000000000000 addresses depending on the number of block intervals.
However, on the ETH chain, it is not possible to generate a transaction with a 0x000000000000 address for every block that passes through, which would waste a lot of gas fees. When a user withdraws the COFI of the market maker pool, at this time the system will calculate the number of blocks between the height of the last transferred block and the height of the current block, and generate the corresponding COFI to be transferred to the market maker pool.
This will cause, the COFI balance of the market maker pool, to be inconsistent with the COFI that should actually be issued to the user, as there is a portion of the COFI, which has actually been generated as the block height passes, but has not been generated and transferred from the 0x00000000 address as no user has done the fetch operation.
So, when the V1 version was closed, some market makers, especially for ETH/HBTC, had a situation where the COFI that should be retrieved disappeared, and after checking the data on the chain, the user losses were as follows.
USDT/ETH, last out of mining blocks: 12450774
HBTC/ETH, last mined block: 12380120
Interval blocks: 70654. 0.297 per block mined, number of blocks not released: 20,984.238 cofi

That is, there are 20,984 COFIs that have actually been generated, and due to the design of the contract, these 20,984 COFIs have not been generated and transferred to the mining pool.

telegram has already had feedback from users on this situation and after community discussion we have decided to compensate those who have lost out:.
0x8bc0fc5b31fa30266a3dd81753be66ee4b62a7f9 ----2802.83cofi
0x5fa1dd7f6dce7066d8be8b8787575d66a20dc44c --- 17277.79cofi
Other --- 903.60cofi

COFI for compensation, sourced from DAO funds.

Vote now on whether you agree to transfer 20,984 COFI from the DAO account to compensate the above users.
author: 0xEd36b17651229475a8EEfbB64B706c18aafD4311
